ygData.subject: Re: Question about the Battle Drum
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I love my Bard; it s my highest level character, and I ll keep playing him unless Verant nerfs them too much in the future.. But.. if you want a *really*
ygData.messageBody:
> But in my defense, being a Bard has been
> *the best* time I've had playing EQ to
> date. I've got a level 24 monk, and he's
> dull, dull, desperately dull.

I love my Bard; it's my highest level character, and I'll keep playing
him unless Verant nerfs them too much in the future.. But.. if you want
a *really* fun character to play, make an Ogre Shaman.

Trust me.

As unamusing as it may sound, my group spent 15 minutes in tears and
laughter as I ran around sitting on people and passing gas.. Telling
people to hold still because Zuug's butt itched. (Ogre's walk around
itching their butts all the time) Yeah yeah, so it's disgusting and
gross.. but so are Ogres. Believe me when I tell you that my friend had
to leave the room because he was laughing so hard. Someone kill-stealed
something from me so I sat on their head and passed gas. It's amazing
how people get up and run when they see "Zuug emits an oderous vapor
towards you!" thinking they're being attacked. :) Watching an Ogre
sneaking up to someone (crouch and walk - looks like you're sneaking
and it's especially cute with Ogre's.. gives them that "Im guilty"
look) is enough to make anyone laugh.

Zuug of Oggok
"Zuug hav mofo mojo! Zuug give zugg-buffs(tm)!"
